mapper.select: select timeline_tbl.user_no, timeline_tbl.topic_no, vote_type, timeline_type, timeline_date, topic_title from timeline_tbl left join topic_tbl on timeline_tbl.topic_no=topic_tbl.topic_no where timeline_tbl.user_no=#{user_no} order by timeline_date desc;

select noti_no, noti_tbl.user_no, noti_tbl.topic_no, other_user_no, noti_type, noti_date, topic_title, user_nick as other_user_nick from noti_tbl left join topic_tbl on noti_tbl.topic_no=topic_tbl.topic_no left join user_tbl on noti_tbl.other_user_no=user_tbl.user_no where noti_tbl.user_no=#{user_no} and noti_check='N' order by noti_no desc;
mapper.update: update noti_tbl set noti_check='Y' where noti_no=#{noti_no};
mapper.select: SELECT topic_tbl.topic_no, topic_tbl.user_no, topic_type, topic_title, topic_short_cont, topic_progress, debate_tot_pro, debate_tot_con, debate_tot_neut, op_cnt, recomnd_cnt, img_file_name, img_ext_name FROM topic_tbl LEFT JOIN debate_tbl ON topic_tbl.topic_no = debate_tbl.topic_no LEFT JOIN (select count(op_no) as op_cnt, topic_no from opinion_tbl) as op_tbl ON topic_tbl.topic_no = op_tbl.topic_no LEFT JOIN (select count(recommend_tbl.topic_no) as recomnd_cnt, topic_no from recommend_tbl) as recommend_tbl ON topic_tbl.topic_no = recommend_tbl.topic_no LEFT JOIN topic_cover_img_tbl AS img_tbl ON topic_tbl.topic_no = img_tbl.topic_no WHERE topic_tbl.user_no=#{user_no} ORDER BY topic_no desc limit #{index}, 9;

select topic_tbl.topic_no, topic_tbl.user_no, topic_type, topic_title, topic_short_cont, topic_progress, debate_tot_pro, debate_tot_con, debate_tot_neut, op_cnt, recomnd_cnt from topic_tbl left join debate_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = debate_tbl.topic_no left join (select count(op_no) as op_cnt, topic_no from opinion_tbl) as op_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = op_tbl.topic_no left join (select count(recommend_tbl.topic_no) as recomnd_cnt, topic_no from recommend_tbl) as recommend_tbl on topic_tbl.topic_no = recommend_tbl.topic_no and topic_tbl.user_no=#{user_no} where topic_progress in (1,4) order by topic_no desc;
mapper.update: update user_tbl set profile_file_name=#{profile_file_name}, profile_ext_name=#{profile_ext_name}, user_profile=#{user_profile} where user_no=#{user_no};
